ygData.subject: Re: Shining Star of Light
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a high elf cleric of Tunare and I had issues with faction. I was dubious when i got there. I spent several days raising my faction with the priests of
ygData.messageBody:
I am a high elf cleric of Tunare and I had issues with
faction. I was dubious when i got there. I spent
several days raising my faction with the "priests of
life". Killing gnolls does not do it. You actually
have to perform quests for the temple of life. The
actualy quest, once you can get it, is easy.

Eylena 19th circle priestess of Tunare.


--- Jeff Habermann <jrhabermann@...> wrote:
> I keep reading that everyone on here loves to use
> there SSOL. I would like to get this weapon as
> well. I am a human cleric from the Temple of Marr
> in Freeport. Will i have problems trying to do the
> quest, or will i be ok? Just want to make sure,
> before I make that loooong journy from freeport to
> qeynos. Thanks
>
>
